sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtncnsltlist ( cnslt_id , cnslt_sj , othbc_at , email_adres , cnslt_cn , managt_cn , managt_de , rdcnt , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , frst_mbtlnum , middle_mbtlnum , end_mbtlnum , writng_de , wrter_nm , email_answer_at , qna_process_sttus_code , writng_password ) VALUES ( #cnsltId# , #cnsltSj# , #othbcAt# , #emailAdres# , #cnsltCn# , #managtCn# , #managtDe# , #rdcnt# , #atchFileId# , SYSDATE() , #frstRegisterId# , #areaNo# , #middleTelno# , #endTelno# , #frstMbtlnum# , #middleMbtlnum# , #endMbtlnum# , #writngDe# , #wrterNm# , #emailAnswerAt# , #qnaProcessSttusCode# , #writngPassword# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtncnsltlist SET cnslt_id = #cnsltId# , cnslt_sj = #cnsltSj# , othbc_at = #othbcAt# , email_adres = #emailAdres# , cnslt_cn = #cnsltCn# , managt_cn = #managtCn# , managt_de = #managtDe# , rdcnt = #rdcnt# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , area_no = #areaNo# , middle_telno = #middleTelno# , end_telno = #endTelno# , frst_mbtlnum = #frstMbtlnum# , middle_mbtlnum = #middleMbtlnum# , end_mbtlnum = #endMbtlnum# , writng_de = #writngDe# , wrter_nm = #wrterNm# , email_answer_at = #emailAnswerAt# , qna_process_sttus_code = #qnaProcessSttusCode# , writng_password = #writngPassword# WHERE 1 = 1 AND cnslt_id = #cnsltId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtncnsltlist WHERE 1 = 1 AND cnslt_id = #cnsltId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT cnslt_id , cnslt_sj , othbc_at , email_adres , cnslt_cn , managt_cn , managt_de , rdcnt , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , frst_mbtlnum , middle_mbtlnum , end_mbtlnum , writng_de , wrter_nm , email_answer_at , qna_process_sttus_code , writng_password FROM comtncnsltlist WHERE cnslt_id = #cnsltId#

SELECT cnslt_id , cnslt_sj , othbc_at , email_adres , cnslt_cn , managt_cn , managt_de , rdcnt , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , frst_mbtlnum , middle_mbtlnum , end_mbtlnum , writng_de , wrter_nm , email_answer_at , qna_process_sttus_code , writng_password FROM comtncnsltlist WHERE 1=1
cnslt_id = #searchKeyword#
cnslt_sj LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY cnslt_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtncnsltlist WHERE 1=1
cnslt_id = #searchKeyword#
cnslt_sj LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
